original_text: He that is born in thy house, and he that is bought with thy money, must needs be circumcised: and my covenant shall be in your flesh for an everlasting covenant.
korean_text: 너희 집에서 난 자든지 너희 돈으로 산 자든지 할례를 받아야 하리니 이에 내 언약이 너희 살에 있어 영원한 언약이 되려니와

sentences.original_text: He that is born in thy house
and he that is bought with thy money
and my covenant shall be in your flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 언약이 너희의 육체에 있을 것이요
